title: Do you fix or install TV antennas?

actions.value:
Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}‍ ,
At IT Solver we do not install or troubleshoot TV antennas. Here are our best options:

  1. Install or fix TV antenna​

    If you want help with installing or fixing a TV antenna, try searching Google Maps for "TV antenna services" or try Yellow Pages.

  2. Switch to TV streaming
    Step into the future (or even the now) of watching TV streamed over the internet. I will be delighted to help setup TV streaming for you. Reply to this email to learn more.

Best regards,
Angus McLauchlan | Technical advisor & sole owner of IT Solver
Call 07 3123 6000 | Book a meeting | Add Angus to contacts

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}‍ ,
At IT Solver we do not install or troubleshoot TV antennas. Here are our best options:

1. Install or fix TV antenna​
If you want help with installing or fixing a TV antenna, try searching Google Maps for "TV antenna services" or try Yellow Pages.

2. Switch to TV streaming
Step into the future (or even the now) of watching TV streamed over the internet. I will be delighted to help setup TV streaming for you. Reply to this email to learn more.
